pullRequest.title: ISPN-12220: expression defaults not working correctly
pullRequest.bodyText:
Defaults for infinispan.cluster.name and infinispan.cluster.stack are set hardcoded, the defaults within the expression ${:XXX} are not working.
https://issues.redhat.com/browse/ISPN-12220

nodes.bodyText: I disagree with this change. If you remove the expression, it will default to cluster.
I disagree with this change. If you remove the expression, it will default to tcp.
